attributes.action: Scrap AM2 which is held by NET.
attributes.additional_details:
It’s an expensive assessment which charges money and it fails people on purpose 

Centres have been told by NET to keep a percentage of failure up
attributes.background:
It’s pointless exam assessment, it’s a scam , make it unmandory again as it was before 

Electrician that have already an level 3 ,inspection and testing , NVQ level 3 are already qualified

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions which call for actions with regard to named individuals, organisations or businesses. Decisions about exams are a matter for the National Electrotechnical Training (NET) charity.
